pr_title: Make zookeeper session cache a separate class

timeline.message: Move the cache part of SessionRepo into its own class

timeline.bodyText:
We're probably talking about the Session class here, so I suggest to say
'any type of @link{Sesssion}'
instead of the slightly confusing 'session that extends the abstract interface'.
timeline.author: gjoranv

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/configserver/src/main/java/com/yahoo/vespa/config/server/session/SessionCache.java b/configserver/src/main/java/com/yahoo/vespa/config/server/session/SessionCache.java
index 83ea342e5d..8808dc0cf7 100644
--- a/configserver/src/main/java/com/yahoo/vespa/config/server/session/SessionCache.java
+++ b/configserver/src/main/java/com/yahoo/vespa/config/server/session/SessionCache.java

@@ -6,7 +6,7 @@ import java.util.HashMap;
 import java.util.List;
 
 /**
- * A session cache that can store any type of session that extends the abstract interface.
+ * A session cache that can store any type of {@link Session}.
  *
  * @author Ulf Lilleengen
  * @author hmusum
